[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module css]]
.hover {
  position: relative;
}
.hover:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span { display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
    bottom: auto;
    right: auto;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 999;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]
